conclusion: Determine which container (D or E) the liquid will flow into after passing through the baffles.
Liquid A (Light Blue) flows downwards and encounters the purple baffle.
Liquid A is directed towards the left side.
Liquid A encounters the yellow baffle.
Liquid A flows directly into container D.
Liquid B (Yellow) flows downwards and encounters the purple baffle.
Liquid B is directed towards the right side.
Liquid B encounters the gray baffle.
Liquid B flows directly into container E.
Liquid C (Blue) flows downwards and encounters the purple baffle.
Liquid C is directed towards the right side.
Liquid C bypasses the yellow baffle and the gray baffle.
Liquid C flows directly into container E.
Liquid A flows into container D.
Liquids B and C flow into container E.
Final answer: Liquid A flows into container D, while Liquids B and C flow into container E.
